sentences.sContent: The weights of a scale in equipoise;
sentences.sContent_eng: The weights of a scale in equipoise;
sentences.sCn: 处于平衡状态的秤盘法码；

sentences.sContent: 2 judgment. that equipoise, that nice adjustment of the faculties one to the other, which is called good judgment, is an essential to the speculator.
sentences.sContent_eng: 2 judgment. that equipoise, that nice adjustment of the faculties one to the other, which is called good judgment, is an essential to the speculator.
sentences.sCn: 判断。平衡力，判断的能力，都叫优秀的判断，这对投机者很关键。

trans.tranOther: even balance of weight or other forces; equilibrium
